SELECT a.product_id AS productId, a.product_name_zh AS productNameZh, a.product_name_en AS productNameEn, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT c.tag_name_zh) AS tagNamesZh, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT e.country_name_zh) AS countryNameZh, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT e.country_name_en) AS countryNameEn, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT f.city_name_en) AS cityNameEn, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT f.city_name_zh) AS cityNameZh, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT h.location_name_zh) AS viewspotsZh, s.supplier_name as supplierName FROM product_base a LEFT JOIN tag_entity_mapping b ON a.product_id = b.mapping_id AND b.mapping_type = 1 LEFT JOIN tag_entity c ON b.tag_id = c.tag_id AND c.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN product_country_mapping d ON a.product_id = d.product_id LEFT JOIN country e ON d.country_id = e.country_id LEFT JOIN city f ON d.city_id = f.city_id LEFT JOIN product_viewspot_mapping g ON a.product_id=g.product_id LEFT JOIN viewspot h ON g.viewspot_id=h.id AND h.deleted=0 LEFT JOIN product_supplier ps on a.product_id = ps.product_id LEFT JOIN supplier s on s.supplier_id = ps.supplier_id WHERE a.deleted = 0
AND a.product_status IN
#{status}
GROUP BY a.product_id limit 0,500
